title: Bug 114470[Smoke]: Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: An error message is displayed when attempting to use the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a filter in a table with a datetime column.
OB: When inputting the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' in the filter field for a datetime column in a table, an error message is thrown.
EB: The system should accept 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a valid value for the filter in a table with a datetime column.
SR:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 
2. Insert a table and add a filter based on the datetime column. 
3. In the 'Value' field of the filter, enter 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as the value.
